plot: Jeremy Irons sets out to discover the extent and effects of the global waste problem, as he travels around the world to beautiful destinations tainted by pollution. This is a meticulous, brave investigative journey that takes Irons (and us) from skepticism to sorrow and from horror to hope.   Written by  Anonymous
title: Trashed

lists.title: Documentales que cambiarán tu visión del mundo
